decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and access statement, Location plan (1:1250), Block Plan, BT-KXPlus ATM - 180
Degrees, elevation drawing received on 26/09/2013 and Location plan (1:500) and 172/L12/01 received on 06/11/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - Prior to commencement of the propopsed development, the two existing BT phone boxes in the pedestrian area between Staines Road and Bell Road shall be removed.
description: Installation of a combined ATM / Payphone Kisok outside of the Bell Pub.
